text: Hianagi kini ne'mo'a ana Kaldia vahera amanage huno zamasami'ne. Nagra tamage hu'na tamasamuankita, ana ava'nafima ke'noa zama onasamita, ana avana'mofo agafa'ama eri ama'ma huta onasami'nazana, vahe huzmante'nuge'za tamagrira tamahe'za rukafri kafro hutregahaze. Ana nehu'za tamagri nona tapage tapagu hu'za magopi eri hihi hugahaze.
